response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its worth of $12,000 to you, I propose to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This exclusive opportunity allows you to acquire an item that is not only highly sought after but also carries a unique appeal tailored to your needs and preferences. Should you choose to accept this offer, you will be securing a valuable asset at a competitive rate. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11000}
